S03n233:3: bodhisattvaḥ kila svapuṇyaprabhāvopanatāmānatasarvasāmantāṃ praśāntasvaparacakrādyupadravatvādakaṇṭakāmasapatnāmekātapatrāṃ dāyādyakramāgatāṃ pṛthivīṃ pālayāmāsa |
S03n233:6: viveda lokasya hi sa svabhāvaṃ pradhānacaryānukṛtipradhānam |
S03n233:7: śreyaḥ samādhitsurataḥ prajāsu viśeṣato dharmavidhau sasañje ||2 ||
S03n233:8: dadau dhanaṃ śīlavidhiṃ samādade kṣamāṃ niṣeve jagadarthamaihata |
S03n233:10: atha kadācittadbhujābhiguptamapi taṃ viṣayaṃ sattvānāṃ karmavaiguṇyātpramādavaśagatvācca varṣakarmādhikṛtānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ durvṛṣṭiparyākulatā kvacitkvacidabhidudrāva |
S03n233:11: atha sa rājā vyaktamayaṃ mama prajānāṃ vā dharmāpacārātsamupanato'nartha iti niścitamatiḥ saṃrūḍhahitādhyāśayatvātprajāsu tadduḥkhamamṛṣyamāṇo dharmatattvajñasaṃmatānpurohitapramukhānbrāhmavṛddhānmatisacivāṃśca taduddharaṇopāyaṃ papraccha |
S03n233:12: atha te vedavihitamanekaprāṇiśatavadhārambhabhīṣaṇaṃ yajñavidhiṃ suvṛṣṭihetuṃ manyamānāstasmai saṃvarṇayāmāsuḥ |
S03n233:13: viditavṛttāntastu sa rājā yajñavihitānāṃ prāṇivaiśasānāṃ karuṇātmakatvānna teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ bhāvenābhyanandat |
S03n233:14: vinayānuvṛttyā cainānpratyākhyānarūkṣākṣaramanuktvā prastāvāntareṇaiṣāṃ tāṃ kathāṃ tiraścakāra |
S03n233:15: te punarapi taṃ rājānaṃ dharmasaṃkathāprastāvalabdhāvasarā gāmbhīryāvagūḍhaṃ tasya bhāvamajānānā yajñapravṛttaye samanuśaśāsuḥ-
S03n233:16: kāryāṇi rājñāṃ niyatāni yāni lābhe pṛthivyāḥ paripālane ca |
S03n233:17: nātyeti kālastava tāni nityaṃ teṣāṃ kramo dharmasukhāni yadvat ||4 ||
S03n233:20: bhṛtyairivājñā bahu manyate te sākṣādiyaṃ siddhiriti kṣitīśaiḥ |
S03n233:21: śreyāṃsi kīrtijvalitāni cetuṃ yajñairayaṃ te ripukāla kālaḥ ||6 ||
S03n233:22: kāmaṃ sadā dīkṣita eva ca tvaṃ dānaprasaṅgānniyamādarācca |
S03n233:24: sviṣṭyābhituṣṭāni hi daivatāni bhūtāni vṛṣṭyā pratimānayanti |
S03n233:25: iti prajānāṃ hitamātmanaśca yaśaskaraṃ yajñavidhiṃ juṣasva ||8 ||
S03n233:26: tasya cintā prādurabhavat-atidurnyasto batāyaṃ parapratyayahāryapelavamatiramīmāṃsako dharmapriyaḥ śraddadhāno jano yatra hi nāma-
S03n233:27: ya eva lokeṣu śaraṇyasammatāsta eva hiṃsāmapi dharmato gatāḥ |
S03n233:31: viśasyamānaḥ kila mantraśaktibhiḥ paśurdivaṃ gacchati tena tadvadhaḥ |
S03n233:32: upaiti dharmatvamitīdamapyasatparaiḥ kṛtaṃ ko hi paratra lapsyate ||11 ||
S03n233:34: paśurdivaṃ yāsyati kena hetunā hato'pi yajñe svakṛtāśrayādvinā ||12 ||
S03n233:35: hataśca yajñe tridivaṃ yadi vrajennanu vrajeyuḥ paśutāṃ svayaṃ dvijāḥ |
S03n233:36: yatastu nāyaṃ vidhirīkṣyate kvacidvacastadeṣāṃ ka iva grahīṣyati ||13 ||
S03n233:39: tadidamatra prāptakālamiti viniścitya sa rājā yajñārambhasamutsuka iva nāma tatteṣāṃ vacanaṃ pratigṛhyāvocadenan-sanāthaḥ khalvahamanugrahavāṃśca yadevaṃ me hitāvahitamanaso'trabhavantaḥ |
S03n233:43: athainaṃ purohita uvāca-īpsitārthasiddhaye snātu tāvanmahārāja ekasya yajñasya samāptāvavabhṛthe |
S03n233:45: yugapatpuruṣapaśavaḥ sahasraśo hi parigṛhyamāṇā vyaktamudvegadoṣāya prajānāṃ te syuriti |
S03n233:46: astyetaditi brāhmaṇairuktaḥ sa rājā tānuvāca-alamatrabhavatāṃ prakṛtikopāśaṅkayā |
S03n233:47: tathā hi saṃvidhāsye yathodvegaṃ me prajā na yāsyantīti |
S03n233:48: atha sa rājā paurajānapadānsaṃnipātyāvravīt-icchāmi puruṣamedhasahasreṇa yaṣṭum |
S03n233:49: na ca mayārhaḥ kaścidakāmaḥ puruṣaḥ paśutve niyoktumaduṣṭaḥ |
S03n233:50: tadyaṃ yamataḥ prabhṛti vo drakṣyāmi vyavadhūtapramādanidreṇa vimalena cāracakṣuṣā śīlamaryādātivartinamasmadājñāṃ paribhavantaṃ taṃ taṃ svakulapāṃsanaṃ deśakaṇṭakamahaṃ yajñapaśunimittamādāsya ityetadvo viditamastviti |
S03n233:57: asmatpriyahitādanyad dṛśyate na hi te priyam ||16 ||
S03n233:58: iti pratigṛhītavacanaḥ paurajanāpadaiḥ sa rājā janaprakāśenāḍambareṇa pratyayitānamātyānpāpajanopagrahaṇārthaṃ janapadaṃ nagarāṇi ca preṣayāmāsa samantataśca pratyahamiti ghoṣaṇāḥ kārayāmāsa |
S03n233:65: atha tadviṣayanivāsinaḥ puruṣā yajñapaśunimittaṃ duḥśīlapuruṣānveṣaṇādaraṃ tamanvavekṣya rājñastāṃ ca ghoṣaṇāmatibhīṣaṇāṃ pratyahamupaśrṛṇvantaḥ pāpajanopagrahāvahitāṃśca rājapuruṣānsamantataḥ samāpatato'bhivīkṣya tyaktadauḥśīlyānurāgāḥ śīlasaṃvarasamādānaparā vairaprasaṅgaparāṅmukhāḥ parasparapremagauravasumukhāḥ praśāntavigrahavivādā gurujanavacanānuvartinaḥ saṃvibhāgaviśāradāḥ priyātithayo vinayanaibhṛtyaślāghinaḥ kṛta iva yuge babhūvuḥ |
S03n233:67: suśuklabhāvācca viruḍhayā hriyā janaḥ saḥ śīlāmalabhūṣaṇo'bhavat ||19 ||
S03n233:68: yathā yathā dharmaparo'bhavajjanastathā tathā rakṣijano viśeṣataḥ |
S03n233:72: parā manīṣā mama rakṣituṃ prajā gatāśca tāḥ samprati dakṣiṇīyatām |
S03n233:73: idaṃ ca yajñāya dhanaṃ pratarkitaṃ yiyakṣurasmīti yathāpratarkitam ||22 ||
S03n233:74: yadīpsitaṃ yasya sukhendhanaṃ dhanaṃ prakāmamāpnotu sa tanmadantikāt |
S03n233:78: atha te tasya rājñaḥ sacivāḥ paramamiti pratigṛhya tadvacanaṃ sarveṣu grāmanagaranigameṣu mārgaviśrāmapradeśeṣu ca dānaśālāḥ kārayitvā yathāsandiṣṭaṃ rājñā pratyahamarthijanamabhilaṣitairarthavisargaiḥ santarpayāmāsuḥ |
S03n233:79: atha vihāya janaḥ sa daridratāṃ samamavāptavasurvasudhādhipāt |
S03n233:87: na janamabhyarujanprabalā rujaḥ paṭutaraṃ guṇamoṣadhayo dadhuḥ |
S03n233:88: ṛtuvaśena vavau niyato'nilaḥ pariyayuśca śubhena pathā grahāḥ ||29 ||
S03n233:89: na paracakrakṛtaṃ samabhūdbhayaṃ na ca parasparajaṃ na ca daivikam |
S03n233:90: niyamadharmapare nibhṛte jane kṛtamivātra yugaṃ samapadyata ||30 ||
S03n233:91: athaivaṃ pravṛttena dharmayajñena rājñā praśamiteṣvarthijanaduḥkheṣu sārdhamupadravaiḥ pramuditajanasambādhāyāmabhyudayaramyadarśanāyāṃ vasundharāyāṃ nṛpaterāśīrvacanādhyayanasavyāpāre loke vitanyamāne samantato rājayaśasi prasādāvarjitamatiḥ kaścidamātyamukhyo rājānamityuvāca-suṣṭhu khalvidamucyate-
S03n233:94: iti | devena hi paśuvaiśasavācyadoṣavirahitena dharmayajñena prajānāmubhayalokahitaṃ sampāditamupadravāśca praśamaṃ nītā dāridryaduḥkhāni ca śīle pratiṣṭhāpitānām |
S03n233:96: lakṣmeva kṣaṇadākarasya vitataṃ gātre na kṛṣṇājinaṃ
S03n233:100: hiṃsāviṣaktaḥ kṛpaṇaḥ phalepsoḥ prāyeṇa lokasya nayajña yajñaḥ |
S03n233:102: aho prajānāṃ bhāgyāni yāsāṃ gopāyitā bhavān |
S03n233:103: prajānāmapi hi vyaktaṃ naivaṃ syād gopitā pitā ||34 ||
S03n233:105: dānaṃ nāma dhanodaye sati jano datte tadāśāvaśaḥ
S03n233:106: syācchīle'pi ca lokapaṃktyabhimukhaḥ svarge ca jātaspṛhaḥ |
S03n233:109: tadevaṃ kalyāṇāśayā na pāpapratāraṇāmanuvidhīyanta ityāśayaśuddhau prayatitavyam |
S03n233:113: dharmābhyāsaḥ prajānāṃ bhūtimāvahatīti bhūtikāmena dharmānuvartinā bhavitavyamityevamapyunneyam |
S03n233:114: na paśuhiṃsā kadācidabhyudayāya dānadamasaṃyamādayastvabhyudayāyeti tadarthinā dānādipareṇa bhavitavyamityevamapi vācyam |
